content: ridgewalk by gabriella roberts details sizing child adult measurements 20 24 in / 51 61 cm worn on head 2 skeins of worsted weight yarn held double yarn pattern is shown in malabrigo rios coco & ivy gauge 16 sts to 30 row for 4 in / 10 cm working in established pattern us 10-16 needles stitch markers notions measuring tape darning needle abbreviations co cast-on p purl bor beginning of the round st s stitche s m stitch marker rs right side pm place marker k knit sm slip marker ktbl knit though the back loop i d love to see your in-progress pictures and finished object photographs please feel free to tag me on instagram @knittygritty and use the hashtag #ridgewalkhat my ravelry group is one more row woodstock and more information about my classes & weekly knit nights can be found on my website www onemorerow net ridgewalk for any pattern questions or support please email me at info@onemorerow net 2 using the german twisted cast on cast on 70 80 sts and join in the round pm set up round k1tbl p1 around work in a k1 p1 rib until the hat measures 5 6 in / 12 15 cm from cast on edge if you would like a folded brim work until hat measures 7 9 in / 18 23 cm from cast on edge decrease set up round * k1 p1 5 10 times pm* repeat from * to * until begin- ning of round decreases 1 ssk work stitches as they appear to last 2 sts k2tog repeat round 1 until there are 8~ stitches left finishing cut yarn leaving a 6 in/15 cm tail using a darning needle run yarn clockwise through live sitches slide of the needle & pull tightly weave in ends sew pompom on top if desired 3
